description:
Sora is a wild crow Misuzu befriended a pet before she met Yukito Kunisaki on the same day. Sora mostly appeared as a minor character throughout most of the series while making important appearances, such as discovering Yukito`s missing puppet or pulling Misuzu`s toy dinosaur to the shrine.
Sora`s true nature is revealed at the very end of the series. He is the reincarnation of Yukito after his plea for a second chance to attempt to save Misuzu.
name: Sora
